name: Random Game (PuffyPuffyGames)
description:
Well this is small project of mine. Im developing it on my free times and i will be making it a small but big game :D

Any support or feedback is appreciated. Thank you ...

How to play ?
-To move forward press "W" button
-To move left press "A" button

-To move right press "D" button
-To move backward press "S" button
